title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Open Educational Practices for Online Learning in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more Open Educational Practices (OEP) strategies in an online learning environment during a pandemic to complete a project
Learners can effectively facilitate relational learning with peer learners and provide feedback using care-based and cognitive empathy teaching methods
Learners can demonstrate language proficiency applicable to real-world work environments by producing project outcomes based on cultural competence
Learners can propose sustainable learning models through knowledge sharing and collaborative processes utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
